```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, loading packages, message=F, warning=F}

# Load libraries
library(readr)
library(httr)

# Load the dataset
file_path <- "./Data/Raw/Wildlife Insights (2021-2022).csv"
wildlife_data <- read_csv(file_path)

file_path <- "./Data/Raw/All Deployments (2019-2022).csv"
deployment_data <- read_csv(file_path)
```

#Metadata for Wildlife Insights.csv

```{r, metadata info, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

# Create Metadata
metadata_wildlife_insights <- list(
  Source = "xxx", #Need details on this
  Description = "Dataset detailing wildlife insights from 2021 to 2022.",
  Columns = colnames(wildlife_data),
  Data_Types = sapply(wildlife_data, class),
  Summary_Stats = summary(wildlife_data)
)


```

#Metadata for All Deployments (2019-2022).csv

```{r, metadata info, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

# Create Metadata
metadata_all_deployments <- list(
  Source = "xxx", #Need details on this
  Description = "Dataset of deployment IDs with their start and end dates.",
  Columns = colnames(deployment_data),
  Data_Types = sapply(deployment_data, class),
  Summary_Stats = summary(deployment_data)
)

```
